Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.title: Disable eksisozluk ad theme option
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### #124735

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [ ] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

review.body: @c0b41 I haven't had the button with Turkish IP on my end. I close the issue for now, but if you get this again, let me know here.

AdGuard gets detected on a website

Safari

Mobile

_No response_

issue.title: tv.kakao.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.0(954)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tv.kakao.com/m/channel/3990670/cliplink/430058191

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, EasyList, List-KR, YousList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
kakao tv is detecting AdGuard.  It seems that kakao tv's advertisement script has been updated. Videos of Kakao TV attached to other web pages are blocked in the same way.
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![02F0AD95-2BBA-4544-BC5A-44AF7A4B56CF](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103377449/183920425-57829053-3df6-4456-8a63-81d213a970fa.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: @piquark6046 Once all the rules are disabled and re-enabled, the video can be played normally.  Thank you so much for the help.

issue.title: community.spontacts.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://community.spontacts.com/index](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcommunity.spontacts.com%2Findex) ### Comment Username: @Morku > Several Ad placeholder on Start, Messages, Profiles, on right side... > You need an Account to enter. issue.title: tv.kakao.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.0(954)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://tv.kakao.com/m/channel/3990670/cliplink/430058191

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, EasyList, List-KR, YousList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
kakao tv is detecting AdGuard.  It seems that kakao tv's advertisement script has been updated. Videos of Kakao TV attached to other web pages are blocked in the same way.
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![02F0AD95-2BBA-4544-BC5A-44AF7A4B56CF](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103377449/183920425-57829053-3df6-4456-8a63-81d213a970fa.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: @piquark6046 When I tried disabling the rule and re-enabling it again, the video on Kakao TV was displayed and played normally.  It seems like it was a temporary error.

issue.title: Android's Spotify Misbehaves

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

adguard-dns.io

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.spotify.music

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

##### To reproduce:

1. With my DNS set to `c6-----.d.adguard-dns.com` in Android's settings.

2. Open Spotify on the phone while playing songs on another device, it does not show the current playing song or controls for changing it. It does not download any song.

3. Put something to play on the phone itself, then I don't see any new scrobbles on https://www.last.fm/user/PeHLC (even after songs ends).

##### To temporarily fix it:

4. Changes my DNS to `one.one.one.one` in Android's settings.

5. Restarts Spotify on phone.

6. Songs start to download, songs playing in other machines suddenly appears, past scrobbles are submitted to Last.fm and can be seen in my profile.

##### Other details:

1. I have a cookie in adguard-dns.io that says `user:"32362--"`

2. Searching for Spotify blocked queries in statistics shows nothing in the past 7 days: https://adguard-dns.io/en/dashboard/statistics/query?limit=20&statuses%5B0%5D=REQUEST_BLOCKED&statuses%5B1%5D=RESPONSE_BLOCKED&companies%5B0%5D=spotify&retention=DAYS_7

3. Spotify version is 8.7.54.403

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [x] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address fix #126972 ### Add your comment and screenshots screenshot 1(mobile) , 2(PC) https://www.openrec.tv/live/2p8vjgoo98y screenshot 3 (mobile) https://www.openrec.tv/m
screenshot 1 ![](https://i.postimg.cc/bJGX08V7/2.png)

screenshot 2 ![](https://i.postimg.cc/NMyMK36M/image.png)

screenshot 3 ![](https://i.ibb.co/rtTx5Zr/1212121.png)

### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

Not reproduced with our filters and Polish ones.
Try to check the filter update, do not leave the AdGuard window for one minute, then open the site.
If that does not help, re-enable content blockers in Safari settings (also wait ~ one minute there).

pull_request.title: www.openrec.tv - social
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [x] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/pull/127206 https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/126972 ### Add your comment and screenshots I am sorry I didn't explain it clearly enough. URL: https://www.openrec.tv/live/2p8vjgoo98y I guess "保存" is a useful element. And I also think "シェア" element is similar to the youtube share button would be useful. #126421 So I worte rule to remove only Twitter and facebook share elements. `openrec.tv##div[class^="MovieToolbar__ShareButtonsWrapper"] > div[class^="SvgIconFillButton__Wrapper-"][role="button"] ` Twitter and facebook elements can be found `MovieToolbar__ShareButtonWrapper-sc-y0l595-2 eausNm`
place of element guide - 1 ![](https://i.postimg.cc/gcHbxWKc/image.png)

place of element guide - 2 ![](https://i.ibb.co/7gncsFN/image-1.png)

before ![](https://i.slow.pics/ClD88Woh.png)

after ![](https://i.slow.pics/mKnbxG2s.png)

### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
It appears to be the Ad Blocker. If I turn that off and leave everything
else on, I'm able to go right in. Turning that on, it just keeps trying to
load at the profile page. Interestingly, if I go all the way in and turn it
back on, the site appears to be fine until I leave it, then it starts
blocking again. So, there is something just on the initial profile
selection page that is fighting with Ad Blocker.

pull_request.title: www.openrec.tv - social
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [x] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address moved from https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/pull/127206 original issue is https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/126972 ### Add your comment and screenshots I am sorry I didn't explain it clearly enough. URL: https://www.openrec.tv/live/2p8vjgoo98y I guess "保存" is a useful element. And I also think "シェア" element is similar to the youtube share button would be useful. (#126421) So I worte rule to remove only Twitter and facebook share elements. `openrec.tv##div[class^="MovieToolbar__ShareButtonsWrapper"] > div[class^="SvgIconFillButton__Wrapper-"][role="button"] ` Twitter and facebook elements can be found `MovieToolbar__ShareButtonWrapper-sc-y0l595-2 eausNm`
place of element guide - 1 ![](https://i.postimg.cc/gcHbxWKc/image.png)

place of element guide - 2 ![](https://i.ibb.co/7gncsFN/image-1.png)

before ![](https://i.slow.pics/ClD88Woh.png)

after ![](https://i.slow.pics/mKnbxG2s.png)

### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 일반적인 애드블록 필터로는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 지원 받는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스를 받고 있어 처리가 까다롭습니다.

이러한 기록은 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 확인하실 수 있으며, 대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [이 곳](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
microShield 유저스크립트를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다. AdGuard 설치버전을 포함한 대부분의 유저스크립트 관리자는 아래 링크를 클릭함으로써, 설치를 진행할 수 있습니다.
https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/raw/main/microShield.user.js

## 유저스크립트가 쉽게 설치가 안되시나요?

위 링크를 클릭하였는데도 설치가 진행되지 않는다면, [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield#how-to-install)에서 설치할 수 있는 방법을 찾으세요.
macOS는 [이 링크](https://kb.adguard.com/en/macos/overview#extensions)를 참고하세요.

## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.43.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://live.bilibili.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment> Go to https://live.bilibili.com find any room having a banner (see screenshot 1) on its cover. This means the room is making a lottery.
2. <comment> After entering such room, there'll be a lottery icon (see screenshot 2) on the left side under the player.
3. <comment> Click it will popup a lottery window (see screenshot 3).
4. <comment> When the rule is enabled, the lottery popup window has a large shadow background (see screenshot 4), and the bottons (join or close) are not clickable. Have to refresh the webpage to make the window disappear. Or disable this rule then every thing will be fine. https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/eb7c3a5c44ab70a28e85c10ab6f7bb5407f29ebd/TrackParamFilter/sections/specific.txt#L763
5. <comment> remove param `from` should be applied **except** live.bilibili.com

6. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![lottery room](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84114630/184405688-51836545-dcf8-4702-8d3e-9b8111990a27.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![lottery icon](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84114630/184405839-abf2be7e-c18a-4430-baa6-46885b8b4685.png)

</details>

![normal lottery popup window](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84114630/184407459-4ebc3970-2f7d-4d20-916f-74047b53b0e7.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 4:</summary>

![error lottery popup window](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84114630/184406272-946669e2-8984-48c7-96d2-2c558be94397.png)

</details>

comment.body: Понимаешь, с этим сайтом вот какая загогулина! При прямом юрл,как в этом случае, при открытии будет страница отображаться без прокрутки в отличие после перехода на неё из агрегатора какого-то. Поэтому недолго думая, нашёл решение, с помощью которого ты можешь воспроизвести проблему! Значится,способ следующий: открываешь не амп версию страницы, открываешь новость любую,далее прописываешь к юрл домена  amplifier в начале типа amp.xxx.xxx, также убираешь префикс www и должно выйти, как на снимке с пролистыванием ленты. Так уже и найдешь искомые кнопки с пропуск.

При прямом юрл,как в этом случае, при открытии будет страница отображаться без прокрутки, в отличие после перехода на неё из агрегатор а какого-то. Поэтому недолго думая, нашёл решение, с помощью которого ты можешь воспроизвести проблему. Значится,способ следующий: открываешь не амп версию страницы, открываешь новость любую,далее прописываешь к юрл домена  amplifier в начале типа amp.xxx.xxx, также убираешь префикс www и должно выйти, как на снимке с пролистыванием ленты. Так уже и найдешь искомые кнопки с пропуск.
